attributes.action: ensure BBC Channel 4 impartiality on Turco-Armenian Affairs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to assure BBC Channel 4 offers fair and equal time coverage of TV documentary programmes pertaining to Turks and Armenians.

BBC Channel 4 is screening films biased in favour of Armenians. The first film was the SCREAMERS on the 29th of March, 07 dealing with the alleged Armenian Genocide whereas the second film is
the "A STORY OF PEOPLE IN WAR" broadcast on the 17th of April 2007. In a short period of time, two Armenian biased films have been shown without offering films telling the Turkish side of the story too.

BBC 4 must maintain fair balance between her Turkish and Armenian viewers/listeners and broadcast Turkish documentary films without delay.

BBC4 should consider following sources of information:

www.tallarmeniantale.com,

Guenter Lewy's "The Armenian Massacres in Turkey, A Disputed Genocide" ISBN-13:978-0-87480-849-0 available on Amazon.com(Jewish author)

"The Armenian Revolt 1894-1920" documentary DVD by Third
Coast Films, P.O. Box 664, Clarion, PA 16214, USA 

"Sari Gelin' documentary DVD through
www.sarigelinbelgeseli.com

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
